Comments_List: Major topics for research in IO, methods used extensively in IO.
Learned to read papers about IO, and also to replicate some of the techniques used in those papers in Matlab.
Knowledge of techniques used in IO like BLP
BLP, auctions, horizontal mergers, endogenous product choice, production functions
This course is extremely well structured and there is a very clear flow in the topics. Even within a topic there is a clear flow as to how research has evolved.

Strength - great professors , good coverage of papers , 
Weakness - none
Yes, especially if someone is interested in learning the frontier methods in IO, that can be used elsewhere as well.
Yes, take this course if the material is interesting to you and you have exhausted the undergrad micro theory/IO courses.
